Muopeni Mbuye wanu (potsatira malamulo Ake ndi kusiya zoletsedwa); ndipo liopeni tsiku limene kholo silidzathandiza mwana wake, ngakhalenso mwana sadzathandiza kholo lake chilichonse. Ndithu lonjezo la Allah ndiloona; choncho usakunyengeni moyo wa dziko lapansi, ndiponso asakunyengeni mdyerekezi pa za Allah
